import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const initialAddress = { firstName: '', lastName: '', phone: '', address1: '', address2: '', country: '', state: '', zip: '', } const Checkout = ({ order, user }) => { const { items, shipping_charge, discount_in_percent, shipping_address, totalCost, totalItems } = order; const dispatch = useDispatch(); console.log(user) const [adsress, setAddress] = useState(initialAddress); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setAddress({ ...addsress, [name]: value, }) } const validateAddress = (adsress) => { if(!adsress.firstName || !adsress.lastName || adsress.phone || adsress.address1 || adsress.country || adsress.state || adsress.pincode) { alert('field is requred'); } else { dispatch({ type: 'ADD_ADDRESS', payload: adsress, }) setAddress(initialAddress); } } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); validateAddress(adsress); } const setShippingAddress = (address) => { dispatch({ type: "SHIPPING_ADDRESS", payload: address, }) } return (

Checkout

  • Items
    {totalItems}
  • Shipping Charges
    ${shipping_charge}
  • Discount({discount_in_percent}%)
    -{totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100}
  • Total (USD) ${totalCost - totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100 + shipping_charge}

Shipping address

{ user.addresses.map((user) =>
{user.firstName} {user.lastName}
{user.address1}, {user.address2}, {user.state}, {user.pincode}

{user.phone}

setShippingAddress(address)} /> Use this Address
) }

) } export default Checkout
